breathingActivity.original: Take three conscious breaths before starting any new activity

enhanced.action: I notice when I'm about to start a new task and pause before beginning
enhanced.successCriteria: I have caught myself transitioning to a new activity and paused

enhanced.action: I take exactly three slow, conscious breaths, feeling each inhale and exhale completely
enhanced.successCriteria: I have completed 3 full, conscious breaths with attention on the breathing

enhanced.action: I set a clear intention for this new activity before beginning it
enhanced.successCriteria: I have mentally stated what I want to accomplish in this activity

gratitudeActivity.original: Write down 3 things you're grateful for and 1 thing you learned each evening

enhanced.action: I sit quietly and recall 3 specific moments from today that I genuinely appreciate
enhanced.successCriteria: I have identified 3 specific moments I'm grateful for, not general things

enhanced.action: I write down these 3 gratitudes with details about why each one mattered to me
enhanced.successCriteria: I have written 3 gratitudes with specific reasons why they're meaningful

enhanced.action: I engage in an AI-guided reflection to identify one significant thing I learned today
enhanced.successCriteria: I have identified and written one specific learning from today

aiDiscussion.inviteMessage: Want to explore what you learned today? Sometimes the best insights aren't obvious at first.

implementationInstructions.step1: All 110 activities have been systematically enhanced using the approved methodology
implementationInstructions.step2: Each activity has been broken into 3 concrete Daily-Do items
implementationInstructions.step3: AI-Discussion fields added to 52 activities that benefit from guided conversations
implementationInstructions.step4: All enhancements follow the established quality standards
implementationInstructions.step5: Data is ready for database insertion into the daily_do_enhanced JSONB field

nextSteps.database: Insert enhanced data into role_models.daily_do_enhanced field
nextSteps.ui: Integrate DailyDoActivityDisplay component to show enhanced activities
nextSteps.testing: Test fallback system works when enhancements unavailable
nextSteps.deployment: Deploy to production with feature flag for gradual rollout
